sources.title: Holiday Joy | Full Hallmark Christmas Movie 2025 | Bailee Madison | French Stewart
sources.description:
Holiday Joy | Full Hallmark Christmas Movie | Bailee Madison | New Christmas Family Movie 

A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.
2016.  Stars: Bailee Madison, Jennifer Robertson, Sandy Jobin-Bevans, French Stewart
